body:
`/usr/bin/whoami` from a shell works. It is also executed successfully from the other tests in the same file. 

I think the test fails because of `cmd.SysProcAttr.Credential = &syscall.Credential{}` (https://github.com/golang/go/blob/8261c887aaf997655b95591c17b1068bb627dc9d/src/syscall/exec_linux_test.go#L115)
